ThingDef.label: intel
ThingDef.description: A dossier containing information about the Shattered Empire. In order to protect the information from the Imperial counterintelligence, the information needs to be stored in a physical form. It can be used to obtain contraband items from the Deserters, or to gain access to quests and even assassination missions on Imperial nobility.

ThingDef.label: critical intel
ThingDef.description: A dossier containing critical information about the Shattered Empire. In order to protect the information from the Imperial counterintelligence, the information needs to be stored in a physical form. It can be used to plan high-profile assassination attempts, but it can also be exchanged into standard intel via the contraband system.
